Generation VI.X: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.
Generation VI.Y: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.

Generation VIII.Sword: Supersized Pumpkaboo are very partial to the spirits of people who were of similarly superior proportions.
Generation VIII.Shield: Massive Pumpkaboo are said to be the product of areas where a great number of lost souls lingered.
